summary: The National Energy Dominance Council Act of 2025 establishes a council within the Executive Office of the President to advise on policies promoting energy dominance. The council will develop a national energy dominance strategy, focusing on increased energy production, streamlining regulations, and attracting private sector investment. The council is composed of various cabinet members and presidential advisors. It also amends existing legislation to reflect the new council's existence and includes the Secretary of the Interior on the National Security Council.
